```{r}
#| label: create-figs
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

create_figs_tables <- FALSE

create_model_plots <- function(
  model_name,
  model_dir = here::here("model", "base_model"),
  save_dir = here::here("presentation", "model_and_diag")
  ) {
  model_dir <- file.path(model_dir, model_name)
  model_output <- r4ss::SS_output(model_dir)
  r4ss::SS_plots(
    replist = model_output,
    plot = c(1, 3:6, 11, 12, 17),
    html = TRUE,
    pwidth = 5.2,
    pheight = 4,
    maxrows = 5, 
    maxcols = 5, 
    maxrows2 = 4, 
    maxcols2 = 4,
    dir = save_dir
  )
  r4ss::SS_plots(
    replist = model_output, 
    plot = 1, 
    minyr = 2000, 
    maxyr = 2025,
    ptsize = 12,
    pheight_tall = 3.5, 
    pwidth = 6.5,
    dir = save_dir
  )
  save(model_output, file = file.path(save_dir, "tables", "model_output.rda"))
}


if (create_figs_tables) {
  model_name <- "8.36_base_model"
  create_model_plots(
    model_name = model_name,
  )
  # remove unwanted files
  all_files <- list.files(here::here("presentation", "model_and_diag", "plots"))
  remove <- c(grep(".html", all_files), grep(".csv", all_files), grep(".txt", all_files))
  file.remove(here::here("presentation", "model_and_diag", "plots", all_files[remove]))
  
}
load(here::here("presentation", "model_and_diag", "tables", "model_output.rda"))

```
